Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.alloc.bmp

package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.alloc.bmp
The BMP control subsystem. This (mainly BMPController is responsible for booting boards and obtaining system information about them (such as the serial version number). It is the only part of the server which talks to any BMP; it takes great care to ensure that only one task is ever given to one BMP at a time.
